Synopsis:
 
Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) has frail health, comes from a poor family and dreams of being part of the American army. That dream is unfeasible because of health problems, but draws attention to a general who sees the dedication of the boy. Therefore, the general invites to participate in the test serum radioactive supersoldier named. Rogers then stays healthy and starts intensive training to fight evil in the leadership of the group The Avengers.
